org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.commun.web

Interface SparqlHttp


  • public interface SparqlHttp
    Author:
    agatting on 12.12.16.

    • Method Detail

      • uploadSparqlRequest

        static void uploadSparqlRequest(java.lang.String sparql,
                                java.lang.String url)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method executes a sparql update/query to the ontology server.
        Parameters:
        sparql - is the sparql update/request string.
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown in case there is no connection to the ontology server.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the httpResponse was not successfully (e.g. wrong sparql string...).

      • uploadSparqlRequest

        static boolean uploadSparqlRequest(java.lang.String sparql)
        Method uploads a sparql expression via function uploadSparqlRequest(String, String) and inserts the input sparql expression to the transactionBuffer in case of IOException. The URL is set to the database path of the fuseki server.
        Parameters:
        sparql - is the sparql update/request string.
        Returns:
        true, if the upload was successfully. Otherwise false and inserts sparql expression to the transactionBuffer (or prints an exception if update string is bad).

      • uploadSparqlRequest

        static void uploadSparqlRequest(java.lang.String sparql,
                                java.lang.String url,
                                long timeout)
                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                java.util.concurrent.CancellationException
        Method executes a sparql update/query to the ontology server via retries (timeout), if the upload could not be done in the first try.
        Parameters:
        sparql - is the sparql update/request string.
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        timeout - is the timeout to limit the time. If 0 the method retries permanently until there is a result (maybe blocks forever!).
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the httpResponse was not successfully (e.g. wrong sparql string...).
        java.lang.InterruptedException - is thrown in case the application is interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.CancellationException - is thrown in case the timeout was reached and the upload trial was canceled.

      • sparqlQuery

        static org.apache.jena.query.ResultSet sparqlQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                                   java.lang.String url)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Method returns the result of a sparql SELECT query, which is send to the ontology server.
        Parameters:
        query - is the SELECT query.
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        Returns:
        the result of the SELECT query.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown in case there is no connection to the ontology server.

      • sparqlQuery

        static org.apache.jena.query.ResultSet sparqlQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                                   java.lang.String url,
                                                   long timeout)
                                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                   java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Method returns the result of a sparql SELECT query via retries (timeout), if the query could not be done in the first try.
        Parameters:
        query - is the SELECT query.
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        timeout - is the timeout to limit the time. If 0 the method retries permanently until there is a result (maybe blocks forever!).
        Returns:
        the result of the SELECT query.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - is thrown in case the application is interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - is thrown in case the callable thread throws an unknown exception.
        java.util.concurrent.CancellationException - is thrown in case the timeout was reached and the upload trial was canceled.

      • checkHttpRequest

        static void checkHttpRequest(org.apache.http.HttpResponse httpResponse,
                             java.lang.String sparql)
                      throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method verifies the http response code. If the http request was not successfully an exception is thrown. Otherwise void. Consider that a httpResponse based on connection. That means the method do not identify an possibly IOException!
        Parameters:
        httpResponse - is the response of the http request.
        sparql - is the sparql update string, which is used for terminal information in case of bad request. Set to null, if not necessary.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the http request was not successfully.
